name: Peckin Order
description:
Description

Only a small mechanical demo of a game that was made in 9 weeks.

You play as a chicken having to get to the end room, but you can't complete the levels without killing all the foxes to protect yourself.

Future Updates

  • Hoping to add more content to the game over the summer holidays to turn it into a full game.
    • Different areas (Woodland, Desert,  Swamp)
    • Shop:
      • Items
      • Weapons
      • Abilities
    • Achievements
    • And lots more

Art & Sounds

As this is a Mechanical Demo I didn't put much into making my own assets for this game, it was more a proof of concept. Because of this, the music and sounds were downloaded. The chicken and fox were also taken heavy inspiration from some pictures from google. 

The only assets that weren't downloaded were the tree and rock which were made in in 30 minutes together.  

If you have any suggestions to add to this project feel free to add a comment below. Any feedback is welcome!
